title: Trade, North Korea, and Big Tech Regulation
itunes:title: Trade, North Korea, and Big Tech Regulation
description:
Kevin spoke with Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and Alex Wayne, Bloomberg News White House Editor about President Trump's visit to Japan and his comments about North Korea and trade.

Kevin also spoke with Christine Pelosi, California Democratic Party Women's Caucus Chair, and House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's daughter about her mother's feud with President Trump, the future of the Democratic party and regulation for Big Tech.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin spoke with Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and Alex Wayne, Bloomberg News White House Editor about President Trump's visit to Japan and his comments about North Korea and trade.

Kevin also spoke with Christine Pelosi, California Democratic Party Women's Caucus Chair, and House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's daughter about her mother's feud with President Trump, the future of the Democratic party and regulation for Big Tech.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
